channel.title: CVE Feed for lf-edge -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for lf-edge -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-43406|2024-08-20T15:00:06.571Z -- lf-edge -- ekuiper
item.description: LF Edge eKuiper is a lightweight IoT data analytics and stream processing engine running on resource-constraint edge devices. A user could utilize and exploit SQL Injection to allow the execution of malicious SQL query via Get method in sqlKvStore. This vulnerability is fixed in 1.14.2.
